name: Driver Boat 3D Sea Crimea
description:
Driver Boat 3D Sea Crimea
Driver Kater 3D Sea Crimea - the game in which you have to manage a speedboat!
Bored of monotonous racing on the usual routes on cars, then this game you like it!
Check your ship for speed, reliability and maneuverability. Earn points and discover new types of boats! Collect the entire collection! Feel the wind of freedom in the sea! Compete with friends, set records!
This application will be an excellent simulator for improving skills of high-speed water management! Be attentive, the slightest loss of attention can lead to a serious accident on the water!
Features Driver Boat 3D Sea Crimea:
- Excellent physics of speedboat control
- excellent 3D graphics
- high-quality soundtrack
- large water park with unimaginable capacity
Leave ratings and comments on the game, and we will improve it with the adventure!
